ps1.4:10.1: ca kho keci → ye keci kho (sya-all); ye hi keci (pts-vp-pli1); ye hi keci kho (mr)
ps1.4:66.1: Purimanidānaṁ → sāvatthinidānaṁ (bj); paripuṇṇanidānaṁ (si, sya-all, mr); pāripuṇṇanidānaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ps1.4:70.2: assaddhiyasaṁvaraṭṭhena → assaddhiyaṁ saṁvaraṭṭhena (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ps1.4:71.25: bhāvanāvasena → ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanāvasena (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ps1.4:96.17: indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṁ → indriyaparopariyatte ñāṇaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed); indriyānaṁ paropariyatte ñāṇaṁ (sya-all)
